projects.name: wanderer.moe
projects.description: Genshin Impact resource website with over 1 million users globally. Built using SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and Cloudflare Pages, with its own API.
Svelte open-source music player with offline support. Customizable interface with CSS & keyboard shortcuts. Includes audio visualization, smart playlists, and LAN sharing.

projects.description: A simple, lightweight, and easy to use discord rich presence for qBittorrent, made with Javascript.

projects.description: Discord bot for 'Roblox-style' moderation using webhooks to imitate user communication.

projects.name: discord custom stream status
projects.description: Self-bot for setting custom streaming status with full name and URL customization options.
